zh-cn: 斯洛文尼亚社会主义共和国

description.zh-cn: 一个位于中东欧，毗邻阿尔卑斯山的国家。曾是南斯拉夫社会主义联邦共和国的一个加盟共和国，于1991年6月25日独立。
description.en: A country located in Central and Eastern Europe, bordering the Alps. It was a constituent republic of the former Socialist Federal Republic of Yugoslavia and became independent on June 25, 1991.

description.zh-cn: 斯洛文尼亚政治人物，现任斯洛文尼亚总统。
description.en: Slovenian politician, the current President of Slovenia.

description.zh-cn: 斯洛文尼亚政治人物，现任斯洛文尼亚总理。
description.en: Slovenian politician, the current Prime Minister of Slovenia.

description.zh-cn: 斯洛文尼亚的两院制立法机构。
description.en: The bicameral legislature of Slovenia.

description.zh-cn: 斯洛文尼亚议会的上议院。
description.en: The upper house of the Slovenian Parliament.

description.zh-cn: 斯洛文尼亚议会的下议院。
description.en: The lower house of the Slovenian Parliament.

nodes.id: 南斯拉夫社会主义联邦共和国

zh-cn: 南斯拉夫社会主义联邦共和国

description.zh-cn: 第二次世界大战后成立的社会主义联邦国家，斯洛文尼亚是其加盟共和国之一。1991年，在斯洛文尼亚宣布独立后，南斯拉夫派兵试图阻止，引发了十日战争。
description.en: A socialist federal state established after World War II, of which Slovenia was a constituent republic. In 1991, after Slovenia declared independence, Yugoslavia sent troops to prevent it, triggering the Ten-Day War.

description.zh-cn: 1991年斯洛文尼亚宣布独立后，与试图阻止其独立的南斯拉夫人民军之间发生的短暂军事冲突。战争以斯洛文尼亚的胜利告终，确保了其独立地位。
description.en: A brief military conflict in 1991 between Slovenia and the Yugoslav People's Army, which tried to prevent its independence after the declaration. The war ended in a Slovenian victory, securing its independence.

description.zh-cn: 南斯拉夫社会主义联邦共和国的领导人。其于1980年逝世后，斯洛文尼亚政府开始进行一系列政治经济改革，最终导向独立。
description.en: Leader of the Socialist Federal Republic of Yugoslavia. After his death in 1980, the Slovenian government began a series of political and economic reforms that eventually led to independence.

description.zh-cn: 欧洲联盟的前身组织之一，于1992年承认斯洛文尼亚为独立国家。
description.en: One of the predecessor organizations of the European Union, which recognized Slovenia as an independent state in 1992.

description.zh-cn: 全球性的国际组织。
description.en: A global international organization.

description.zh-cn: 欧洲和北美国家为实现防务合作而建立的国际组织。
description.en: An international organization established by European and North American countries for defense cooperation.

description.zh-cn: 一个由欧洲多个国家组成的政治和经济联盟。
description.en: A political and economic union of states located primarily in Europe.

description.zh-cn: 使用欧盟的官方货币欧元作为其唯一法定货币的欧盟成员国所组成的货币同盟。
description.en: A monetary union of European Union member states that have adopted the euro as their sole legal tender.

description.zh-cn: 一个允许成员国之间人员自由流动的区域，基于申根公约建立。
description.en: An area comprising 27 European countries that have officially abolished all passport and all other types of border control at their mutual borders.

description.zh-cn: 中欧的一个二元君主国，是哈布斯堡王朝的继承国家。斯洛文尼亚曾是其领地，帝国在第一次世界大战后解体。
description.en: A dual monarchy in Central Europe and a successor state of the Habsburg monarchy. Slovenia was part of its territory. The empire dissolved after World War I.

description.zh-cn: 一场主要发生在欧洲的全球性战争，导致了奥匈帝国等帝国的崩溃。
description.en: A global war originating in Europe that led to the collapse of empires, including Austria-Hungary.

nodes.id: 斯洛文尼亚人、克罗地亚人和塞尔维亚人国

zh-cn: 斯洛文尼亚人、克罗地亚人和塞尔维亚人国
en: State of Slovenes, Croats and Serbs

description.zh-cn: 奥匈帝国崩溃后短暂成立的国家，其领土由斯洛文尼亚人、克罗地亚人和塞尔维亚人组成，后并入塞尔维亚人、克罗埃西亚人和斯洛维尼亚人王国。
description.en: A short-lived state formed after the collapse of Austria-Hungary, composed of territories inhabited by Slovenes, Croats, and Serbs, which later merged into the Kingdom of Serbs, Croats and Slovenes.

zh-cn: 塞尔维亚人、克罗埃西亚人和斯洛维尼亚人王国

description.zh-cn: 第一次世界大战后在巴尔干半岛成立的王国，斯洛文尼亚是其一部分，于第二次世界大战期间被轴心国入侵而灭亡。
description.en: A kingdom in the Balkans established after World War I, of which Slovenia was a part. It was dissolved during World War II after the Axis invasion.

description.zh-cn: 第二次世界大战中与同盟国对立的军事联盟，主要成员包括纳粹德国、意大利王国和日本帝国。
description.en: A military coalition that fought in World War II against the Allies, with primary members including Nazi Germany, the Kingdom of Italy, and the Empire of Japan.

description.zh-cn: 第二次世界大战期间，轴心国对南斯拉夫王国发动的入侵行动。
description.en: The Axis powers' invasion of the Kingdom of Yugoslavia during World War II.

description.zh-cn: 指在1933年至1945年期间由阿道夫·希特勒和纳粹党统治的德国。第二次世界大战期间曾兼并斯洛文尼亚部分地区。
description.en: Refers to Germany between 1933 and 1945, when it was governed by Adolf Hitler and the Nazi Party. It annexed parts of Slovenia during World War II.

description.zh-cn: 指1861年至1946年期间的意大利。第二次世界大战期间曾兼并斯洛文尼亚首都卢比安纳及西部地区。
description.en: Refers to Italy between 1861 and 1946. It annexed the Slovenian capital Ljubljana and its western regions during World War II.

description.zh-cn: 两次世界大战之间的匈牙利国家。第二次世界大战期间曾兼并斯洛文尼亚部分地区。
description.en: The state of Hungary between the two World Wars. It annexed parts of Slovenia during World War II.

description.zh-cn: 斯洛文尼亚的首都及最大城市。
description.en: The capital and largest city of Slovenia.

description.zh-cn: 于公元7世纪兴起的第一个斯洛文尼亚族国家，后于745年被法兰克帝国吞并。
description.en: The first Slovene state, which emerged in the 7th century and was annexed by the Frankish Empire in 745.

description.zh-cn: 中世纪早期西欧和中欧的大国，于745年吞并了卡拉塔尼亚公国。
description.en: A major power in Western and Central Europe during the Early Middle Ages, which annexed Carantania in 745.

description.zh-cn: 欧洲历史上最显赫、统治领域最广的王室之一。斯洛文尼亚大部分地区自14世纪起成为其领地。
description.en: One of the most prominent and extensive royal houses in European history. Most of Slovenia became its territory from the 14th century.

description.zh-cn: 娜塔莎·皮尔茨·穆萨尔是斯洛文尼亚的现任总统。
description.en: Nataša Pirc Musar is the current President of Slovenia.

description.zh-cn: 罗伯特·戈洛布是斯洛文尼亚的现任总理。
description.en: Robert Golob is the current Prime Minister of Slovenia.

description.zh-cn: 斯洛文尼亚国民大会是斯洛文尼亚议会的上议院。
description.en: The National Council is the upper house of the Slovenian Parliament.

description.zh-cn: 国民议会是斯洛文尼亚议会的下议院。
description.en: The National Assembly is the lower house of the Slovenian Parliament.

description.zh-cn: 从14世纪起，斯洛文尼亚大部分地区成为哈布斯堡王朝的领地。
description.en: From the 14th century, most of Slovenia became a territory of the House of Habsburg.

description.zh-cn: 奥匈帝国在第一次世界大战中战败，随后崩溃。
description.en: Austria-Hungary was defeated in World War I and subsequently collapsed.

relationships.target: 斯洛文尼亚人、克罗地亚人和塞尔维亚人国

relationships.source: 斯洛文尼亚人、克罗地亚人和塞尔维亚人国

description.zh-cn: 斯洛文尼亚人、克罗地亚人和塞尔维亚人国与塞尔维亚王国合并，成立了塞尔维亚人、克罗埃西亚人和斯洛维尼亚人王国（后更名为南斯拉夫王国）。
description.en: The State of Slovenes, Croats and Serbs merged with the Kingdom of Serbia to form the Kingdom of Serbs, Croats and Slovenes (later renamed the Kingdom of Yugoslavia).

description.zh-cn: 第二次世界大战期间，纳粹德国兼并了斯洛文尼亚的中、西和东部。
description.en: During World War II, Nazi Germany annexed the central, western, and eastern parts of Slovenia.

description.zh-cn: 第二次世界大战期间，义大利王国兼并了斯洛文尼亚，首都卢比安纳及西部被并入义大利。
description.en: During World War II, the Kingdom of Italy annexed Slovenia, incorporating the capital Ljubljana and western parts into Italy.

description.zh-cn: 第二次世界大战期间，匈牙利王国兼并了斯洛文尼亚的部分领土。
description.en: During World War II, the Kingdom of Hungary annexed parts of Slovenian territory.

relationships.target: 南斯拉夫社会主义联邦共和国

description.zh-cn: 南斯拉夫领导人铁托在世时维持了联邦的统一；其于1980年逝世后，斯洛文尼亚政府开始进行一系列寻求更大自主权的政治经济改革，最终导向独立。
description.en: Yugoslav leader Tito maintained the unity of the federation during his lifetime; after his death in 1980, the Slovenian government began a series of political and economic reforms seeking greater autonomy, which eventually led to independence.

description.zh-cn: 斯洛文尼亚在十日战争中成功抵抗了南斯拉夫军队，确保了国家的独立。
description.en: Slovenia successfully resisted the Yugoslav army in the Ten-Day War, securing the country's independence.

relationships.source: 南斯拉夫社会主义联邦共和国

description.zh-cn: 在斯洛文尼亚宣布独立后，南斯拉夫派兵宣战，试图阻止其独立，引发了十日战争。
description.en: After Slovenia declared independence, Yugoslavia sent troops and declared war in an attempt to prevent its secession, triggering the Ten-Day War.

description.zh-cn: 欧洲共同体于1992年承认斯洛文尼亚为独立国家。
description.en: The European Community recognized Slovenia as an independent state in 1992.

description.zh-cn: 745年，卡拉塔尼亚公国被法兰克帝国吞并。
description.en: In 745, Carantania was annexed by the Frankish Empire.
